!Bard Rukal: Elemental magic is like a song from heaven. Combining the songs of the spirits is fundamental in the use of elememtal magic. *Mystics* must have a complete understanding of the elements of tone. The Test of the Magus will assess your understanding of the tones of the 4 elements. Those who pass this test will have a chance to advance to the higher level of Elemental Magic.
